subject: resource/Poultrygeist:_Night_of_the_Chicken_Dead
object: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead is a 2006 zombie comedy/horror musical-exploitation film from Troma Entertainment, directed by Lloyd Kaufman and co-directed by former long-time Troma editor Gabriel Friedman from a screenplay by Friedman and Daniel Bova. The film opened to positive reviews from Entertainment Weekly, and The New York Times,. Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead was released in 2006 in theaters and in 2008 on DVD.
human_readable: The comment for Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead is that it's a 2006 zombie comedy/horror musical-exploitation film from Troma Entertainment, directed by Lloyd Kaufman and co-directed by former long-time Troma editor Gabriel Friedman from a screenplay by Friedman and Daniel Bova. The film opened to positive reviews from Entertainment Weekly, and The New York Times. It was released in 2006 in theaters and in 2008 on DVD.
